title: When does the time for Tahajjud (Night Prayer) end? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: tahajud prayer when does it end the answer is with the break of dawn which is the horizontal white thread that appears in the east which separates the blackness of the night this white horizontal thread is called the break of dawn which is usually inaugurated by or identified by the event the moment that Martha says Allahu Akbar that is the end of your Tahajjud
